Text: Thanks for the new HTV, but these 2 new vids of yours are of remarkably lower quality than usual, perhaps because of the program you used to superimpose your logo?  I watch these on my 360 and the video is choppy and laggy, not to trash your work, but this and the Michael Strahan video were unwatchable for me.

Ok it turned out to be watchable, so I take that back, but I was disappointed in the quality in that it wasn't up to your usual standard.  Thanks again for the upload, if I didn't enjoy them so much I wouldn't be commenting.
